title: I messed up with the Chroma Pack!
body: So, I bought some Amumu chroma skins one by one, without realizing I could get the whole pack....... is there any way to get the pack? I bought 4 skins before I made the discovery and only have 2 refund tokens. I just want the pack -_____- halp

replies.body: Oops!  We might be able to help with this!  Per our [refund guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ), we could look into providing a refund for the chroma purchase if you have a refund token.  If you don't, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) anyway, and we'll see if we can work something out.  I can't guarantee anything but we like to look at each case individually.  I hope that helps!
